title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4041.1 - Colors registered with The Jockey Club
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4041.1 - Colors registered with The Jockey Club

State Regulations

Racing colors shall be registered by The Jockey Club
annually or for the period of five years. Colors so registered shall not be
taken by any other person. All disputes as to the right to particular colors
shall be settled by The Jockey Club. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4041.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
